submission:
class Solution:
    def countOfPairs(self, nums: List[int]) -> int:
        p = 10**9+7 
        n = len(nums)
        n1= nums[0]
        d = [i+1 for i in range(n1+1)]
        for i in range(1, n):
            n2 = nums[i]
            n1 = nums[i-1]
            d2 = [0 for i in range(n2+1)]
            for a2 in range(n2+1):
                r = a2
                r2 = n1+a2-n2
                r4= min(r,r2)
                if 0 <= r4:
                    d2[a2]+=d[r4]
                    d2[a2] = d2[a2] % p
            d = [d2[0]]
            for i in range(1, n2+1):
                d.append((d[-1]+d2[i]) % p)

        return d[-1] % p
